title: The Friendship Fairies Save Christmas
description: There’s much excitement in the Dixon household as the Friendship Fairies’ dad has bought his own bakery - and he’s planning on opening it just in time for Christmas!The girls are busy helping him get ready, and enjoying sampling the wares as they go. But when a little elf from nearby Red Forest comes seeking their help, they down tools and jump into action, for in the magical forest, disaster looms. The elves are normally busy helping Santa prepare for Christmas, making toys and sweets for all his special deliveries. But this year, their machines have broken down, and everything has ground to a haltCan Emme, Holly and Jess - with some assistance from Dad - help save the (Christmas) day?
author: Lucy Kennedy
